DOC.brief_summary: Examine the safety, tolerability and efficacy of travoprost benzalkonium chloride (BAK) free ophthalmic solution compared to either latanoprost or bimatoprost monotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: Examining The Efficacy, Safety And Improved Tolerability Of Travoprost BAK Free Ophthalmic Solution (Travatan-Z) Compared To Prior Prostaglandin Therapy
DOC.criteria: Adults with a clinical diagnosis of ocular hypertension, or primary openangle, pigment dispersion or exfoliation glaucoma in at least one eye (study eye) Age
